con:part.con:content: <application xmlns:soa="http://www.oracle.com/soa/rest" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:rs="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc title="BillRS_rest">BillRS REST Service</doc> <grammars> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" schemaLocation="BillRO.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </grammars> <resources> <resource path="/queryStatus"> <method name="GET" soa:wsdlOperation="queryStatus"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="rs:ESBMsg"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="rs:ESBMsg"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Bill/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:rcom="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Common/V1" xmlns:eo="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EnterpriseObjects/Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/Bill/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EnterpriseObjects/Transactions/Bill/V1/BillEO.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="Bill" type="BillType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Bill =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="BillType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:BillIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="eo:BillType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rcom:Amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="eo:BillStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= ESB Message =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="rcom:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Bill" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ProjectES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> con:request.con:request:
<v11:ESBMsg xmlns:v1="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/Common/V1" xmlns:v11="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/RS/Polaris/CurrencyExchange/V1" xmlns:v12="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:v13="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Transactions/CurrencyExchange/V1"> <!--Optional:--> <v1:MsgID>string</v1:MsgID> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <v11:RqData> <!--Optional:--> <v11:CurrencyExchange> <!--Optional:--> <v12:CurrencyExchangeIdentifier> <!--Optional:--> <v12:CurrencyExchangeID>string</v12:CurrencyExchangeID> </v12:CurrencyExchangeIdentifier>
<v13:CurrencyExchangeType>T</v13:CurrencyExchangeType> <!--Optional:--> <v13:FromCurrencyCode>KES</v13:FromCurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <v13:ToCurrencyCode>UGX</v13:ToCurrencyCode> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <v11:ConversionRate> <!--Optional:--> <v1:Value>1000.00</v1:Value> <!--Optional:--> <v1:CurrencyCode>KES</v1:CurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <v1:BaseValue>1000.00</v1:BaseValue> <!--Optional:--> <v1:BaseCurrencyCode>string</v1:BaseCurrencyCode> </v11:ConversionRate> </v11:CurrencyExchange> </v11:RqData>
</v11:ESBMsg>

type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="NationalIdentityID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="ProjectNumber" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Transactions =============--> <xsd:element name="BillID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="TransferID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="CurrencyExchangeID" type="IDType"/> <!--============= Others =============--> <xsd:element name="BankID" type="IDType"/> <xsd:element name="BranchID" type="IDType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Others =============--> <xsd:complexType name="BranchIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="BranchIdentifierType"/> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:complexType name="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="BranchIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> type="ChequeIdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ChequeBookIdentifierType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AccountIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ChequeBookID" <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Enterprise =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="AccountES"/> <!--============= Instruments =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="CardES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <!--============= Misc =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="NotificationES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DocumentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TagES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FileES"/> <!--============= Parties =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CustomerES"/> <!--============= Resilience =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BiometricES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ListOfValuesES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NationalIdentityES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ProjectES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SignatureES"/> <!--============= Transactions =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BillES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CurrencyExchangeES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Query"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QueryStatus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Requester"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Business"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Enterprise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Provider"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Enterprise =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Accounts =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="AccountES"/> <!--============= Instruments =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="CardES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ChequeBookES"/> <!--============= Misc =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="NotificationES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DocumentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TagES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FileES"/> <!--============= Parties =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BillerES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CustomerES"/> <!--============= Resilience =============--> <xsd:enumeration value="BiometricES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ListOfValuesES"/> <xsd:enumeration <xsd:enumeration value="PaymentES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TransferES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CurrencyExchangeES"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IndicatorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:pattern value="false"/> <xsd:pattern value="true"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MeasureType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumericType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PercentType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RateType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseValue" type="xsd:decimal" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="baseUnitCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="URIType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YearType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gYear"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:pattern value="01"/> <xsd:pattern value="02"/> <xsd:pattern value="03"/> <xsd:pattern value="04"/> <xsd:pattern value="05"/> <xsd:pattern value="06"/> <xsd:pattern value="07"/> <xsd:pattern value="08"/> <xsd:pattern value="09"/> <xsd:pattern value="10"/> <xsd:pattern value="11"/> <xsd:pattern value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MonthDayType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:gMonthDay"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PositiveIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NonNegativeIntegerType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/ESB/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgID" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Source" type="com:IDType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="com:MsgTypeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Service" type="com:ServiceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="StatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Type" type="com:StringType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Text" type="com:TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Status" type="com:StatusType"/> </xsd:schema>

<!--============= Referenced Elements =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="TransferType" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="PurposeCode" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="ChargeEventID" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="ChargeOption" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="WaiveChargesIndicator" type="com:IndicatorType"/> <xsd:element name="TransferOrderType" type="com:CodeType"/> <!--Added By Mustaque Start--> <xsd:element name="TransferSubType" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionParticulars" type="com:TextType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionReferenceNumber" type="com:IDType"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionSerialNumber" type="com:IDType"/> <!--Added By Mustaque End--> <xsd:element name="DebitValueDate" type="com:DateType"/> <xsd:element name="DebitExecutionDate" type="com:DateType"/> <xsd:element name="CreditValueDate" type="com:DateType"/> <xsd:element name="CreditExecutionDate" type="com:DateType"/> <xsd:element name="InstructedAmount" type="com:AmountType"/> <xsd:element name="TransferReferenceNumber" type="com:IDType"/> <xsd:element name="IntermediaryIndicator" type="com:IndicatorType"/> <xsd:element name="IntermediaryAccount" type="com:AccountReferenceType"/> <xsd:element name="TransferStatus" type="com:CodeType"/> <xsd:element name="Transfer" type="TransferType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Transfer =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="TransferType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:TransferIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransferType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PurposeCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ChargeEventID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ChargeOption" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="WaiveChargesIndicator" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransferOrderType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransferSubType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransactionParticulars" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransactionReferenceNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransactionSerialNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="InstructedAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:ChargeAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:ValueDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="DebitValueDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="DebitExecutionDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CreditValueDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CreditExecutionDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Rate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Remarks" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TransferReferenceNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:PayFromAccount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PayeeAccount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:CountryCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="IntermediaryIndicator" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="IntermediaryAccount" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:MobileWalletVendor" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PayFromMobileWallet" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:PayeeMobileWallet" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="TransferStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= ESB Message =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ESBMsgType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:ESBMsgType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="RqData" type="RqDataType"/> <xsd:element name="RsData" type="RsDataType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ESBMsg" type="ESBMsgType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RqDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Transfer" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="actionCode" type="ActionCodeType" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RsDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Transfer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Action Codes =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CreateMobileWalletTransfer"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreateRetailIntraBankTransfer"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreateRtgsTransfer"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreateSwiftTransfer"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>
